title: Trend Micro Mobile Security for Enterprises widget WFUser Authentication Bypass Vulnerability
description:
This vulnerability allows remote attackers to bypass authentication on affected installations of Trend Micro Mobile Security for Enterprises. Authentication is not required to exploit this vulnerability.
The specific flaw exists within the WFUser class defined within the web/widget path. The issue results from improper implementation of the authentication mechanism. An attacker can leverage this vulnerability to bypass authentication on the system.
addtionnal_details: Trend Micro has issued an update to correct this vulnerability. More details can be found at:https://success.trendmicro.com/solution/000293106
timeline:
2023-01-18 - Vulnerability reported to vendor
2023-05-12 - Coordinated public release of advisory
credit: Poh Jia Hao of STAR Labs SG Pte. Ltd.
